creditline: The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: pleated skirt; horizontal striped waistband with tan, blue and green stripes; top section is blue (indigo?) with two narrow blue and white stripes above appliqué and a wide blue and white stripe below; appliqué in orange, green and blue geometric shapes; fabric under appliqué is dark blue with white pattern; lowest section of skirt is heavy black fabric in two layers
title: Skirt
